text: Bryan Neathway Brown, (born June 23, 1947) is an Australian movie, television, stage, and voice actor who is known for his roles in The Thorn Birds, Beautiful Kate, Cocktail, Along Came Polly, Australia and Peter Rabbit. Brown was born on June 23, 1947 in Sydney, Australia.Bryan Brown Biography (1947-) He has been married to Rachel Ward since 1983.
